content.name: Chill Turrets (Fixed Version)
content.description: This mod was originally created by Chillmatica, designed to improve the AI behavior of turrets on ships in Starsector, and reduce the need for repetitive manual adjustments through automatic targeting settings.
content.author: Mantxi

text.name: Chill Turrets (Fixed Version)
text.description: Установите и забудьте - турели с прогрессивным выбором цели, чтобы уменьшить ручное изменение настроек.
text.author: Mantxi
